name: Change feedly main color to red
description: Change the feedly main color from green to dark red
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("cloud.feedly.com") {

*.action ,
*.action:hover ,
*.action:visited ,
.entryBody a ,
.entryBody a:visited ,
.commentsHolder a ,
.commentsHolder a:visited ,
.feedHeader .feedTitle ,
.miniH2 ,
#loadingSummary h2 ,
.categoryBySubscriptionHeader .categoryTitle ,
.sponsor .label ,
.cell h2 ,
.listColumnArea .listLabel ,
.nbrRecommendations ,
.why ,
.pageSectionHeader ,
.pageSectionDecoration ,
.searchTerm ,
.profile .label ,
#aboutarea a ,
#merlin_results .source .header ,
.socialPost .action ,
.endOfSectionAction ,
.newLabel ,
.formContainer .secondaryActionLink, .inlineFormContainer .secondaryActionLink, .transparentFormContainer .secondaryActionLink ,
#feedlyHelpSignPart .shortcut 
{ 
    color: #bc1009 !important; 
} 

*.subscribeAction ,
.hAction ,
.viewerIcon.hi ,
.tagged ,
#feedlyMessageBar ,
#messageBarContent .transparentFormContainer .actionButton ,
.tag ,
.wikiWidgetShareHolder:hover .wikiWidgetShare.shared ,
.welcome ,
.panelButton ,
#allDone ,
.formContainer .actionButton, .inlineFormContainer .actionButton 
{ 
    background-color : #bc1009 !important; 
} 

.tagged ,
.viewerIcon.hi ,
h2.dndActive ,
.quickGoto .selected ,
.links .group a:hover ,
.links .group div:hover 
{ 
    border-color: #bc1009 !important; 
}

  #feedlyMessageBar, 
  #feedlyMessageBarClose, 
  #messageBarContent, 
  #proBanner {
    display: none !important;
  }

}
